_aChangeLog.text: Made first skip harder to do
Added fog for ambience and slight fps boost
Fixed first booster not resetting properly
Fixed last booster not boosting high enough and double boosting if you jumped on a seam

_aLatestUpdates._sText: Thanks to Trickster for telling me about the velocity sensor that Xen made.

_sText:
Spent a couple weeks making this with some off days. Very quickly made so I could release it on christmas, but I did put a lot of time in even if it might not show.

Please message me if you find any bugs, gameplay or otherwise.

Edit: Forgot to include the triggers on compile yesterday so redownload it. :)
